content.textfile:
Yes, the LONG awaited release of DoomEd, 4.2.
Written by Geoff Allan, requires Windows 3.1 or above.
Very solid editor, works with Doom 1 or Doom 2. Allows you to view Heretic maps, but the Heretic lists aren't in here yet. Look for it soon.

review.text: How would this be a "LONG awaited" release? Its a buggy peice of shit!
